messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE: My Pokémon and I seek only victory!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I failed my Pokémon!
I wasn’t prepared enough to lead it!I don’t ever want my precious Pokémon
to be humiliated again!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
You’ve beaten us once before, but we
won’t make the same mistake!
